game.name: Resident Evil 6

about.short: Resident Evil 6 is a large-scale action-horror game featuring four interwoven campaigns with Leon, Chris, Jake, and Ada facing the global C-virus outbreak.
about.full: Resident Evil 6 expands the franchise into an action-packed, globe-trotting bio-terror story with four intersecting campaigns. Players experience unique gameplay styles across each campaign — atmospheric survival horror with Leon and Helena, military-style shooter with Chris and Piers, hand-to-hand combat specialization with Jake and Sherry, and stealth-oriented missions with Ada Wong. The C-virus outbreak spans Tall Oaks, Lanshiang, Edonia, and underwater Neo-Umbrella facilities. With intense boss fights, cinematic sequences, character-driven storytelling, and co-op gameplay, RE6 delivers the most ambitious multi-perspective narrative in the series.

feature_list: Four main campaigns with intersecting timelines
Massive enemy variety including J'avo, C-Virus mutants, and zombies
Agent Hunt Mode — play as enemies to invade other players
Enhanced visuals on PS4/Xbox One versions
Includes all DLC and multiplayer modes

tips: Always dodge — RE6 dodge system makes boss fights easier.

Use quick-shot + melee to save ammo.
Search for skill points to unlock major perks.
Helena’s Hydra shotgun is extremely powerful at close range.
Perfect dodge gives slow-mo counter windows.
